lines.text: You know, when you smile like that, you *do* look like Jack Lemon!

I want to see everybody's license! I want to see your driver's license, pilot license, transport license, hangar license, building license and see your license license. And everybody everywhere is under arrest!
I'm going to Fiji, where the women are women and the men are worms!

[to Frank]
Are you asking meto go back to the same lousy life I had ten years ago before I had this lousy life?
Girls, look! It's my wife. She used to work here. She married the boss. See? If you're nice to me, maybe you can marry me.
I need a plan - something that's vicious, low, filthy, and dirty.
Well, you'll think of something, Angel.

[Indignantly to Rudolph]
This filthy rag is using sex and me for no better purpose than to make money!

[to Bob Weston]
Thank you from the heart for living down to my expectations.

[Referring to his women's hosiery business]
The competition is killing me!
What do you call it when you hate the woman you love?
Does your husband Frank come home to you every night?
No, because, you see, I don't go home every night.
